translations: 暴发的；轰响的；突然闪亮的

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the relation between fulminant hepatitis and multiple organs failure (MOF).
sentences.translation: 目的探讨重型肝炎与器官功能衰竭(MOF)的关系。

sentences.sentence: Clinical manifestations included initial onset type (44.4%), chronic relapsing type (36.4%), chronic persistent type (16.4%), and acute fulminant type (2.8%).
sentences.translation: 临床分型以初发型(44.4%)和慢性复发型(36.4%)为主，其次为慢性持续型(16.4%)，暴发型仅占2.8%。

sentences.sentence: Objecitive to improve the identify ability and treated level of fulminant myocarditis Attaching importance to the clinical and assistant examine characteristics.
sentences.translation: 目的重视暴发型心肌炎的临床特征和辅助检查特点，提高对本病的识别能力和治疗水平。
